entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , La Sarre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:21 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.6°C

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
